scripts.deploy-jarvis: yarn build && s3cmd sync build/* s3://jarvis.wpopera.co --no-check-certificate --add-header="Cache-Control:max-age=0" --acl-public --delete-removed  --force
scripts.deploy-leonardo: yarn build && s3cmd sync build/* s3://leonardo.wpopera.co --no-check-certificate --add-header="Cache-Control:max-age=0" --acl-public --delete-removed  --force
scripts.deploy-leocodex: yarn build && s3cmd sync build/* s3://leocodex.wpopera.cloud --no-check-certificate --add-header="Cache-Control:max-age=0" --acl-public --delete-removed  --force
